title: NFL Investigation Finds Patriots Did Tamper With Ball Inflation
teaser: After months of speculation and a Super Bowl win, what does this mean for the team's quarterback Tom Brady and the team's record?
contentencoded:
After months of speculation and a Super Bowl win, an NFL investigation has concluded the New England Patriots tampered with footballs for the AFC championship game against the Indianapolis Colts.

What does this mean for the team’s quarterback Tom Brady and the team’s record?  Here & Now’s sports analyst Mike Pesca discusses “Deflategate” with host Robin Young.

Guest

  • Mike Pesca, Here & Now sports analyst and host of Slate’s daily podcast The Gist. He tweets @pescami.
